parts.heading: About Taj Mahal
parts.text: The Taj Mahal is one of the most beautiful monuments in the world, located in Agra, India.

parts.heading: Architecture
parts.text: The Taj Mahal is made of white marble and is considered one of the finest examples of Mughal architecture.

parts.heading: Heritage
parts.text: It is recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site and attracts millions of tourists every year.
